name: authenticas-backend
description: B2B authentication system for corporate purchase verification

scripts.copy-data: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src='src/data';const dest='dist/data';if(!fs.existsSync(dest))fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true});fs.readdirSync(src).filter(f=>f.endsWith('.json')).forEach(f=>fs.copyFileSync(path.join(src,f),path.join(dest,f)));console.log('Data files copied to dist/data')"
